flawed_nl_solution:

So that means in 6 years James will be 36/2=<<36/2=18>>18 years old
So right now James is 18-6=<<18-6=9>>9 years old
So James's older brother is 9+4=<<9+4=13>>13 years old

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 9. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
